title: Fixed Supply Token
description: A fixed supply token contract that allocates the indicated amount of tokens to the token contract owner on deployment.

params.name: Symbol
params.description: The symbol used to identify your token

params.name: Name
params.description: The name that you will give to your tokens

params.name: Total Supply
params.description: The amount of tokens that will be minted (you cannot mint more after deployment)

params.name: Decimals
params.description: Maximum number of decimals (If you want to create a token that can only handle cents, use 2)

resume: This contract will mint @-totalsupply @-symbol (@-name) with a maximum of @-decimals decimals to the sender address.
